DOC.brief_summary: ADIPOGEST study aim compare circulate level inflammatory adipocytokins C-reactive protein obese woman newborn delivery whether expose Gestational Diabetes Mellitus ( GDM )
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between Gestational Diabetes Mellitus Inflammatory Adipocytokins Obese Mothers Their Newborn Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: ADIPOGEST cross sectional study mother divide 2 group : expose unexposed GDM , match pregestational BMI , date delivery child gender . Mothers recruit maternity ward University Hospital South Reunion Island . It plan conveniance sample 20 mother-child pair per group .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman Obese woman ( BMI : 30 kg/m² ) Aged 18 year With single pregnancy With alive newborn 37 week amenorrhea With informed consent Smoker Treatments corticoïds thyroid hormons Overt diabetes Complicated pregnancy Premature delivery threat
